column1: #Text=Tong says : " I find that hard to swallow , considering what you did to us in your past life !
#Text=" Villager # 2 says : " We used to be a great society before you killed our leader .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang would never do something like that .
#Text=And it 's not fair for you all to question his honor !
#Text=" Villager # 3 says : " Let 's tell her what we all think of the Avatar 's " honor " !
#Text=" Aang says : " Give me a chance to clear my name !
#Text=" Tong says : " The only way to prove your innocence is to stand trial .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'll gladly stand trial !
#Text=" Tong says : " You 'll have to follow all our rules .
#Text=" Aang says : " How was I supposed to know they would n't take Water Tribe money ?
